snippet: The Simons Foundation plans to announce on Tuesday that the University of California, Berkeley, will be the home of a new center that combines computing theory with fields like biology or economics.
abstract: Simons Foundation, which specializes in science and math research, plans to announce that the University of California, Berkeley, will be the home of the Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing; decision underscores the growing influence of computer science on the physical and social sciences.
lead_paragraph: The Simons Foundation plans to announce on Tuesday that the University of California, Berkeley, will be the home of a new center that combines computing theory with fields like biology or economics.

headline.seo: Simons Foundation Chooses U.C. Berkeley for Computing Center
headline.main: California Chosen as Home for Computing Institute
headline.print_headline: California Chosen as Home for Computing Institute
